Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Expands the ethical duties of public officers and employees
Summary: Expands the ethical duties of public officers and employees to include compliance with the state human rights law and any policies or procedures implemented by their employer related thereto.
LawCode: Amd ยง74, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to expanding the ethical duties of public officers and employees
